attributes.action: Creation of dedicated UK citizen-only passport control channels at UK airports
attributes.additional_details:
On arrival at UK airports, returning UK citizens are currently obliged to file into "EU+EEA+Switzerland" passport control channels, queueing along with citizens of no fewer than 30 other countries just to enter their own homeland.

We demand the creation of UK citizen-only passport control channels at UK airports to speed the arrival processing of our own citizens, a privilege already enjoyed by the citizens of the United States, for example.
